title: If my phone got stolen and reset cus I still locate who has it with the IMEI. I have my receipt.
content: I already tracked through find my phone but the person who stole it obviously knew what they were doing and turned it off and factory reset holding down the button,(btw with new Samsung phones you can't do that) I have the IMEI so I would like to know if I could still find out if someone reset it but turned it back on.
